name: Polenta Fries
description: Tired of the ol’ potato? Switch up your fry game with polenta – aka – cornmeal. Kind of like the French fry version of cornbread. Give it a whirl!

ingredients.name: Tuscan Chicken Burger Seasoning or Fajita Seasoning

preparation: In a Multipurpose Steamer, blend cornmeal with cheese and seasoning. Stir in water.
Cover and microwave on high for 10 minutes. Cool completely (refrigerate if in a hurry)
Turn polenta out onto a cutting board. Cut into French fry-shaped pieces. Place on a crisper, then use a basting brush to lightly brush with oil.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving and 1⁄2 cup of veggies.
